channel.title: I ade a server. how do i run it to the public
channel.description:
do i type in the ip or leave it as 127.0.0.0? do i click on ayran then press "run" and trype runserver.bat?
im not sure what to do someone help me

item.title: I ade a server. how do i run it to the public
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. First, to have it go into to the public, you gotta change your router. Then, to get a server thats like something.no-ip.org you gotta go to www.no-ip.com and sign up and fill everything out. Then, if you dont wanna change your router or not sign up, download Hamachi at www.hamachi.cc and then you start it up, you click on the triangle then make a new network (or something like that) and then the 4 numbers at the top of you hamachi box is your ip.

Read full topic
